sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' const DisplayTodo = ({ item }) => { return ( <> { item.name ? <>{item.name}{item.status}
: {'No Todos'} } ) } const Text = styled.span` text-decoration: ${props => (props.completed ? 'line-through' : 'none')}; margin: 5px background-color:#3b4049 border-radius:5px ` const Status = styled.span` position:absolute right:37% ` export default DisplayTodo;
